Question: This person designed a limited edition clothing line for Candie's, which was released in stores in July 2010.
Hints: This person's aunt Sandra Bridges Covington, with whom she had been very close, died of ovarian cancer in January.
The song later became this person's sixth number one single on the UK Singles Chart and peaked at #3 on US Billboard Hot 100.
Worldwide, this person has sold over one billion bottles in only five years, which earned her an estimated $1.5 billion.
